Files in this particular directory ("external") and its subdirectories are not part of Hourglass and are not covered by its license.
They are like the other files you would typically compile or link with to allow your program to run on Windows.
They are provided here for convenience only, and in case Microsoft decides to stop distributing them or introduce breaking changes in them.
If their copyright owner (or enough other people) so requests it, they will be removed and replaced with a link to where they can be obtained.
